K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-9: lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-11: yi dvags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro; ;gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong s'a la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-13: zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-16: de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la bltas te de lta bu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-20: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas de lta bu bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291a-21: dge slong bsod snyoms pa kha cig bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-2: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs pa'i tshe bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-3: de dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas nas 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de nyid kyang ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-4: bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-5: bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa 'dis bdag cag yongs su gdung bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-6: zhes brjod par 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang 'di gzigs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong s'a la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung bar [?] bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-8: gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-9: khyim bdag rnams byin gyis brlabs pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-10: de ltar bsod snyoms mi ster to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-12: de yang de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-14: bdud sdig can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms kyi bar chad byed par mi nus pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-15: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:291b-16: khyim bdag rnams kun tu byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-2: las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-3: sems can de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pa de lta bur ston par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas zhal zas bcad cing chad pa de na bdud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-5: bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-6: lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-7: nyan thos dag yid mi bde bar mi 'dug gam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems par byed; de dag nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems kyis sems par byed pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-8: thugs kyi gnas gcig tsam la yang mtho ba med cing dma' ba med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-9: sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang de bzhin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-10: phyis ji lta ba bzhin du sngon yang de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-11: yid mi bde ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong nas de'i tshe na lha'i bu bdun khri 'dus par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292a-12: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bshad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-0: de bzhin gshegs @292b pa phyi [?] ma'i skye bo la gzigs pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa yod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-5: bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-6: zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-9: las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phang bar yang spyod mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-12: nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba la skur pa btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pas skur bar 'gyur bas de dag 'gyod pa can du gyur pa'i tshe de dag skur ba btab pa na 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang re zhig mngon sum du skur ba brnyes par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-14: bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces zer zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-15: de dag de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:292b-16: nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-2: re zhig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa yin pas rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-3: shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-5: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de kun tu srung bar spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-6: zhes mkhyen par gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-7: de kun tu srung bar yang mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-9: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir ro; ;gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na zla ba gsum du lta chas kyi nas dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-12: zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-16: khyim bdag de dag de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drang bar mi sems par shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-17: shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa der dbyar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par zla ba gsum gyi bar du gang dag gi rta chas gsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa @293b sngon gyi rgyal pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa sha stag yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-1: de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song nas sdig pa'i las byas pas las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-2: rta lnga brgya bo de dag gi nang na rta cang shes gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-3: byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang gis bsam bzhin du der skyes pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-4: rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-5: de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir der skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-6: rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-7: de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rta lnga brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dbyar der gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-11: des na rta cang shes kyi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-13: rta lnga brgya po de dag gi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-14: dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'bul zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:293b-15: rta cang shes de rta'i skad des rta lnga brgya po de dag sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-0: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge @294a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-1: slong lnga brgya po dag la phyag 'tshal du yang bcug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-3: de nas zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas rta lnga brgya po de dag shi 'phos te dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes nas lhar gyur pa de dag gis yang de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-8: rta lnga brgya po de dag 'dul zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta rdzi gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gang yin pa de la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-13: mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-15: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-18: gyo mo la sogs pa yongs su longs spyad par gyur na yang shing dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-21: gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294a-22: ro bro ba'i mchog gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-0: stong gsum gyi @294b stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-2: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba brnyes pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-4: de'i phyir rnam grangs des na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-7: bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-9: gzhan yang dge slong kun dga' bo 'di snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzad pa lta zhes snying rje bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas kun dga' bo; ;'di ci'i ro yin shes sam zhes nas kyi 'bru gcig byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-12: des de zos nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te nga la 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-14: bdag ni; rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-15: bdag gis ro 'di lta bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-16: sngon chad ma myong lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-18: de'i byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zas mi za bar dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:294b-19: bde bas zhag bdun 'das par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-0: de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di @295a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-3: gang la yang las kyi sgrib pa mi mnga' ba yin par rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-4: sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-5: bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag mgron du gnyer la zas 'bul gar mi byed pa de dag gis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir las kyi rgyud de lta bu nye bar ston par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-7: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la zhal zas ma gsol ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos su lung bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par la ltos; rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-8: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag las dge slong bzhi bcu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295a-10: sdug pa'i mtshan ma la spyod pa yin pas gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod pa dag zos par gyur na 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-0: de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags dang ldan @295b pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sra ba mor gyur nas de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-3: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa nges par rtogs pa des ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-4: legs pa kho nar nges par rtogs pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-7: byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-8: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-9: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag ;bkri don gsungs pa gang yin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-10: des don gsungs pa gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-11: legs pa kho nar rtogs par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-12: brtan pa dgongs la mkhas gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-13: nying mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-15: gsungs pa khong du chud pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-18: byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-19: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-21: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:295b-22: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag; gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-0: yid dvags kyi sdug bsngal dag gis kun tu gdungs zhing tsha bar gyur kyang nyan thos dang @296a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-1: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa mi skyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-3: kye ma bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-4: ces don nyung ngur mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-5: bya ba nyung ngur mi byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-7: bya ba nyung ba nyid la brtson par mi byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-9: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i las bya ba dag la grogs su 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-10: sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-12: yang dag par dga' bar byed de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-16: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-17: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-18: snying rje'i bdag nyid can dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-19: ri 'dra'i sems kyis spyod byed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-20: sems can don la mi skyo zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-21: byang chub las ni phyir mi ldog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems can la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-23: phan par 'dod pas skyo mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296a-24: sems can gzhan la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-0: bag med pa yang @296b mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chos gang dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags pa'i chos bcu po de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-6: theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-8: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:296b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:302b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:302b-22: chos smra ba de la sdang ba'i sems skyed par bgyid na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:302b-24: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ma lags pa ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-4: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur pa de bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-5: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-6: chos smra ba de la zhe sdang ba'i sems skyed par byed pa de bsod nams ma yin pa ches grangs med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-7: ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-10: 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-11: sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-15: ma dad pa rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bgyi lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-18: sems can thams cad kyis chos kyis 'phongs par gyur pa'i sug las bgyis nas lus zhig ste gum pa'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur bar rjes su bsrung bar bgyi 'tshal ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303a-22: de dag gi mdun du brjod par bya ba kho na yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-0: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi bla na @303b med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-7: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos bcu pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-8: byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-13: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-17: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-18: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-19: chos bcu pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-20: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-004:303b-22: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
